name: Nintendo Letter Box
synopsis: Share messages and more with your friends in a fun, new way with Nintendo Letter Box. This free software allows you to send and receive messages via StreetPass. Write a greeting or make a drawing, in 2D or 3D, and your friends will see the message animate as if it is being re-created before their eyes! You can also share photos and sound effects from your Nintendo 3DS, and you can even use Play Coins to unlock new stationery designs.
